name: ICED
description: The protagonist goes winter fishing on a lake and is caught in a snowstorm. He decides to wait it out in a tent and falls asleep. When the cold wakes him up, he finds his burner empty, his tent cold, and the ice outside broken, leaving him with no way back to the shore.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6700 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650ti or comparable DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960  or comparable DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
